「漫画村」画像掲載の男に有罪…「著作物の収益構造を破壊」

07 Nov 2019, 12:55

　違法コピーした漫画を海賊版サイト「漫画村」（閉鎖）に無断で公開したとして、著作権法違反（公衆送信権の侵害）に問われたアルバイト藤崎孝太被告（２６）の判決が７日、福岡地裁であった。足立勉裁判官は懲役１年６月、執行猶予３年、罰金５０万円（求刑・懲役１年６月、罰金５０万円）を言い渡した。
　漫画村を巡る著作権法違反事件では４人が起訴されており、判決が出るのは初めて。
　判決によると、藤崎被告は漫画村の元運営者、星野路実（ろみ）被告（２７）らと共謀。２０１７年５月、東京都内の自宅で、人気漫画「キングダム」や「ＯＮＥ　ＰＩＥＣＥ（ワンピース）」の画像データをパソコンを使ってアップロードし、作者の著作権などを侵害した。
　足立裁判官は「報酬目的で星野被告らから指示されるままに作業に従事した。著作物の収益構造を破壊し、著作権の保護制度を根本から揺るがしかねない悪質な犯行」と指摘。判決言い渡し後、「軽い気持ちでやってしまったと思うが、社会的影響は大きい。今後立ち直ってほしい」と説諭した。

"Manga village" guilty of a man in the picture ... "Destroy the earnings structure of the copyrighted work"

07 Nov 2019, 12:55

The ruling of part-time job Kota Fujisaki (26), who was accused of violating the copyright law (infringement of public transmission rights), was declared on the 7th in Fukuoka, where illegally copied comics were disclosed to the pirated site “Manga Village” (closed) without permission. It was the district court. Judge Adachi sentenced him to imprisonment in June 1 year, suspended for 3 years, and a fine of 500,000 yen (June 1 year in prison and imprisonment, a fine of 500,000 yen).
”Four people have been prosecuted for copyright law violations involving Manga Village, and this is the first time that a judgment has been issued.
According to the ruling, Defendant Fujisaki conspired with former manga village operator Romi Hoshino (27) and others. In May 2017, he uploaded images of popular manga “Kingdom” and “ONE PIECE” using a personal computer at his home in Tokyo, and infringed the author's copyright.
Judge Adachi pointed out, “I was engaged in work as directed by Defendants Hoshino for the purpose of compensation. It was a vicious crime that could destroy the profit structure of the copyrighted work and shake the copyright protection system fundamentally.” After handing down the judgment, he argued, “I think he did it lightly, but it has a great social impact.
